title: State of Marksmen and what needs to be done.

body:
I dont really think its necessary to say much more, some people try to argue but it seems I just need to quickly take a screenshot. Now to the real reason Im making the post. I was an ADC main and will agree as will most people that before the rework ADC's were quite broken and wayy too snowbally. Although what the role has been brought to know is quite a joke. I want to know what you guys think needs to be done to bring the ADC role into a usable enjoyable place. I havent played this game for a while but to see a role that I used to play a lot be reduced to this point is quite sad.
Looking forward to seeing a few good suggestions
